name: Zipf's Law Analysis
description: Tests adherence to Zipf's law in intensity value distribution. Natural images follow Zipf's law more closely than AI-generated content.
mechanism: Ranks pixel intensity values by frequency and tests power-law fit. Natural images follow Zipf's distribution while AI images deviate.
parameters: Ranking: frequency-based, Fit: log-log linear regression
source: Zipf (1949), Human Behavior and the Principle of Least Effort
useCase: Detecting deviations from natural Zipf distribution
